feed.title: BIPs - notarization protocol and decentralized storage protocol

entry.title: BIPs - notarization protocol and decentralized storage protocol
entry.summary: Chris, a member of the Bitcoin community, has created two additional BIPs (Bitcoin Improvement Proposals) that are related to the BIP he sent out last week. The first BIP, named storage, can be found on GitHub at https://github.com/cgilliard/bips/blob/storage/bip-XXXX.mediawiki. The second BIP, named notarization, can be found at https://github.com/cgilliard/bips/blob/notarization-l2/bip-XXXX.mediawiki.Chris is asking for feedback or comments on these new BIPs.
